org.intermine.neo4j.cypher

Class TreeNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.neo4j.cypher.TreeNode

  • public class TreeNode
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes a Node of a PathTree.
    Author:
    Yash Sharma

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the name of the TreeNode. It is a part of a path. For example, in the path Gene.chromosomes.interactions, we have three names which will be represented by TreeNodes. NOTE THAT names are not unique, multiple TreeNodes may have same name as a name can be repeated in a path.
        Returns:
        the name of the TreeNode

      • getVariableName

        public java.lang.String getVariableName()
        Gets the variable name of the TreeNode. It is unique for each node and is used to refer to this node in the Cypher query.
        Returns:
        the variable name of the TreeNode

      • getGraphicalName

        public java.lang.String getGraphicalName()
        Gets the Neo4j name of the TreeNode. For Graph Nodes it is a label, for Relationships it is the Relationship Type and for Properties, it is the Property Key.
        Returns:
        the graphical name of the TreeNode

      • getParent

        public TreeNode getParent()
        Gets the parent TreeNode of the given TreeNode. Null is returned for the root TreeNode
        Returns:
        the reference to the Parent TreeNode, null if the current TreeNode is root of the PathTree

      • getTreeNodeType

        public TreeNodeType getTreeNodeType()
        Finds out where the current TreeNode represents a Graphical Node, Relationship or Property
        Returns:
        the type of the TreeNode

      • getChild

        public TreeNode getChild(java.lang.String key)
        Gets the children of the TreeNode with the given name.
        Parameters:
        key - the name of the child
        Returns:
        the reference to the child

      • addChild

        public void addChild(java.lang.String key,
                     TreeNode child)
        Add a child to the TreeNode with the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key for the child TreeNode
        child - the child TreeNode

      • getChildrenKeys

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getChildrenKeys()
        Gets the names of all the children of the current TreeNode
        Returns:
        the set of names of all the children of the current TreeNode

      • setGraphicalName

        public void setGraphicalName(java.lang.String graphicalName)
        Sets the graphical name of the TreeNode
        Parameters:
        graphicalName - the graphical name

      • setTreeNodeType

        public void setTreeNodeType(TreeNodeType treeNodeType)
        Sets the TreeNodeType of the TreeNode
        Parameters:
        treeNodeType - the TreeNodeType

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Coverts a TreeNode to its String representation
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the string representation of the TreeNode
